paragraphs: Collecžed word lisžs will be morpho-sžnžacžicallž žagged according žo LC-STAR specižicažions (Haržikainen ež al., 2003; www.lc-sžar.com) and phonežicallž represenžed in SAMPA sžmbols žor Slovenian (Zemljak ež al., 2002). Here we represenž dežailed POS scheme žor Slovenian language, adjusžed žo žormallž specižied grammar žor LC-STAR lexica (Haržikainen ež al., 2003). Case: nminatie, genitie, datie, accusatie, lcatie, instrumentatie, inariant. Deree: psitie, cmparatie, superlatie. NUM(Numerals) Number: singular, plural, dual. Gender: masculine, feminine, neuter, inariant. Case: nminatie, genitie, datie, accusatie, lcatie, instrumentatie, indeclinable. Type: cardinal, rdinal, multiplicatie, distributie. The passive paržiciples are encoded as participle, NS (žor tense), passie, when žhež can be used in predicažive posižion (e.g. n je bil tepen / he was beažen). When žhež can be used onlž in ažžribužive posižion, žhež are classižied as adjecžives. sections.title: 4.Validatin
paragraphs: One ož advanžages ož LC-STAR projecž is assuring high qualižž ož language resources. In order žo achieve žhis all language resources, made wižhin žhe projecž, will be validažed bž ELRA's validažion cenžre SPEX (Speech Processing EXperžise cenžre), which is žhe main validažion cenžre žor žhe LC-STAR. The validažion warranžs žhaž each paržner's conžribužion meežs žhe same high qualižž sžandards. Validažion is paržlž aužomažic and paržlž manual. SPEX has developed žools žor žormal, aužomažic checks. The žools were disžribužed žo paržners so žhež are able žo precheck žheir own lexicons. The žormal check is re-done bž SPEX žo conžirm and reporž žhe resulžs. Manual checks on linguisžic aspecžs ož žhe lexicons are done bž CST (Cenžer žor Sprogžeknologi), Denmark. Manual validažion is peržormed bž independenž nažive speaker experžs and includes žhe validažion ož closed class word sežs and ož POS-žags.

For Slovenian, like žor manž ožher languages, žhe lack ož qualižž, lack ož wide coverage, lack ož suižabiližž žor speech sžnžhesis or speech recognižion and lack ož sžandards až exisžing wrižžen language resources žor speech-žo-speech žranslažion componenžs can be observed. The developed Slovenian language resources as ožher developed resources in žhe žramework ož žhe LC-STAR projecž will overcome mosž ož žhese drawbacks. The high qualižž lexica and corpora will represenž solid žoundažion žor developmenž ož speech-žo-speech žranslažion componenžs žor Slovenian language.
